ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: (Oh darn, and I was looking forward to a cruise on the Titanic. Oh well. For the sake of RPG, they can use a smal transport pod) ... She gave him a funny look.

(Oh darn, and I was looking forward to a cruise on the Titanic. Oh well. For 
the sake of RPG, they can use a smal transport pod)

::Shadow Wing::

She gave him a funny look. "Why am I helping you? Huh, I guess I really 
didn't think about it.  I don't know for sure.  I guess I'm just following 
my instincts on this one."
At first she didn't really have a reason for why she was helping him.  But 
now she had a reason.  She was growing fond of him. But he was in a class of 
his own. (another science joke)

------Original Message---
From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
Date: Fri Jun 30, 2000 6:59pm
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

(According to the AMERICAN version the ARK crashed into MT saint
Helens, and made it erupt in the 80's when they awoke. In this game
the ARK crashed somewhere in Tibet.)OH well I guess we'll have to
book a cruise. As long as it's not aboard the Titanic.

Lunarpine continued to look at Shadow Wing, was it because of her
beautiful white feathers, or because of the animal she represented.
Either way she was out of his class. (science joke.) They shared this
world, this land, this night, and most importantly, this journey.

"tell me again Shadow Wing, why are you helping me?"
